tool_description: API to shorten and manage your links. Supports custom domains and analytics.
name: Blanq
title: Blanq

api_list.name: createShortLink
api_list.description: Create a short link from a long link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blanq2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blanq2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blanq2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blanq2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
